abstract: Brooklyn Nets center Brook Lopez has opted out of last year in his contract with team to become free agent; General Manager Billy King says he hopes to re-sign Lopez.
lead_paragraph: Coming off a strong season in his return from injury, Lopez chose on Friday to bypass the $16.7 million he would have earned next season. He will be able to talk to other teams July 1.

headline.main: Nets’ Brook Lopez Will Be Free Agent
headline.print_headline: Nets’ Lopez Will Be Free Agent

snippet: Coming off a strong season in his return from injury, Lopez chose on Friday to bypass the $16.7 million he would have earned next season. He will be able to talk to other teams July 1.
